  • Constructor Details

    • Snake

      public Snake​(int speed, int lives, Coordinate startPoint, Map map, SnakeSkin skin)
      Constructor to create a snake object
      Parameters:
      speed - Speed of the snake
      lives - Initial lives of the snake
      startPoint - Initial position of snake
      map - The map the snake will be drawn onto
      skin - The skin the snake has equipped

      public boolean handlePowerUp​(MultiplayerPowerUp power) throws java.io.IOException
      Method to handle a collision between a snake and a powerup
      Parameters:
      power - the powerup the snake has collided with
      Returns:
      Whether or no the snake has captured the powerup
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the AudioController fails
